channel.title: Text coloring, Censoring, Items on music player tab, and Server overload
channel.description:
Hi :)
Text coloring:
When I go to a server, sometimes people will have the labels on things, such as "Attack (Player name)" turned to something like "Murder" or something. I've tried finding where these labels are stored so I could edit them, but I've had no luck. Please help?
Censoring:
I know there's a command that handles the commands that people give the server (::noclip, etc.), but I'm looking for one that deals with just regular messages. I'd like to have the power to censor what people type in. Much like the real RS :)
Items on the music player tab:
In a few servers I've been on, people have had their music player tab be the home for an extra skill they add in. (Such as Summoning or Disguising.) Is there a way I can add this in mine? Where is that kind of stuff kept? I've searched Server.java, but I was unable to find anything.
Server overload:
It seems that after just a little too much clicking on a server that I've been on alone, (TestScape. Just me, on my computer.) causes the server to disconnect me. How can I give the server more room to work with, so that this doesn't happen if I ever make a public server?
One last thing,
The skill numbers are very confusing. How do I know what I'm dealing with when I say something like playerLevel[-Number]?
Thank you, please try to help!
-Mike
EDIT:
Oh, one more thing.
How do I make it so when someone attacks something, they wait a certain amount of time in between attacks? As it is now, it hits over and over again without waiting.

item.title: Text coloring, Censoring, Items on music player tab, and Server overload
item.dc:creator: @jason2gs jason2gs
item.description:
@jason2gs wrote:

I guess I put Text coloring with a bad description. Or the other way around…

How would I make it change from “Attack” to “Own” or “Kill” or something?

So I can just download a server with something on the music player tab and take it from that?

Thank you for your help![br][size=1]Posted on: July 08, 2007, 11:46:15 AM[/size][hr]Very sorry for bumping. I just really need these questions answered

Read full topic

item.title: Text coloring, Censoring, Items on music player tab, and Server overload
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

i can anwer most…
Text coloring:
search it and change like suppose its red it should be like @red@
Items on the music player tab:
Most servers come with this already
Server overload:
this is called massing it causes server lagg if you don’t want this change all the disconnect = true;'s into false
attacks:
search the item’s id and change the wep delay

Read full topic
